response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $8,000 by us due to its exceptional quality and unique features. Considering its high standards and benefits, I am extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $7,500. This offer is exclusive to you and aims to make this remarkable product accessible while ensuring you receive the best value for your investment. I look forward to your consideration and the chance to discuss how this product could significantly enhance your needs or projects. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 7500}
